summary: The Ensuring Workers Get PAID Act of 2025 establishes a Payroll Audit Independent Determination (PAID) program within the Department of Labor. This program encourages employers to voluntarily correct wage and hour violations of the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 through self-audits. The bill outlines application procedures, review processes, settlement terms, and protections for employers participating in the program, including confidentiality of submitted information and specific limitations on investigations. It aims to improve worker wages and reduce litigation while promoting employer compliance.
